text: 2|245|Kist, ki ʙa Alloh taolo qarz dihad; qarzi naku [va az amvolaş dar rohi xuşnudii Parvardigor infoq kunad], to [Alloh taolo] onro ʙarojaş candin ʙaroʙar kunad? Va Alloh taolo ast, ki [az rūji hikmat va adolat, dar rūzii ʙandagonaş] tangī va kuşoiş padid meovarad va [hamagī dar oxirat] ʙa sūji Ū ʙozgardonda meşaved
